original_text: Then all the people who live in Egypt will know that I am the Lord. Israel's people thought that you would help them. But you were only like a weak stick for them.
korean_text: 애굽의 모든 주민이 내가 여호와인 줄을 알리라 애굽은 본래 이스라엘 족속에게 갈대 지팡이라

sentences.original_text: Then all the people who live in Egypt will know
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 애굽에 사는 모든 백성이 알게 될 것입니다

sentences.original_text: But you were only like a weak stick for them
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 당신은 그들에게 약한 지팡이와 같았을 뿐입니다
